title.rendered: 2022 World Cup in Qatar Doha Hotels

content.rendered:
2022 World Cup Hotels & Accommodations

Our World Cup accommodations are carefully selected to give our guests the very best of Qatar. In order to provide a true luxury experience, our hotels are based in the capital city of Doha. This sophisticated urban center is convenient to all of the World Cup venues and offers wonderful restaurants, incredible shopping, and an abundance of cultural attractions.
